step.description: Happy path: Perform a basic search with a general query to validate DuckDuckGo integration.
Dependent call: Search with a custom number of results (within valid range) to test parameter handling.
Dependent call: Fetch the content from the first result of the initial search to verify webpage scraping functionality.
